# Apex Studio - AI Video Generation Platform

> Apex Studio is an AI-powered video creation platform that transforms text descriptions and images into professional cinematic video content.

## Overview

Apex Studio enables users to create high-quality videos using artificial intelligence. The platform handles script writing, scene generation, voice synthesis, and video productionâ€”all from simple text prompts or reference images.

## Core Capabilities

- **Text-to-Video Generation**: Transform written descriptions into video clips
- **Image-to-Video**: Animate static images into dynamic video content
- **AI Script Writing**: Automatically generate scene-by-scene scripts from concepts
- **Voice Synthesis**: Generate natural voiceovers for video narration
- **Character Consistency**: Maintain visual consistency for characters across scenes
- **4K Video Output**: Professional quality up to 4K resolution with HDR support

## Pricing

Apex Studio uses a credit-based system:
- **Free Tier**: 50 credits to start (5 video clips)
- **Starter**: $29/month for 500 credits
- **Growth**: $79/month for 1,500 credits  
- **Agency**: $199/month for 5,000 credits

Each 5-second video clip costs 10 credits. Voice narration is included at no extra cost.

## Use Cases

1. **Marketing Teams**: Create product demos, social media ads, and promotional content
2. **Content Creators**: Produce YouTube videos, TikTok content, and educational material
3. **E-commerce**: Generate product showcase videos and customer testimonials
4. **Enterprise**: Training videos, internal communications, and corporate presentations

## Technical Details

- Video formats: MP4 (H.264, H.265), WebM, MOV
- Image inputs: PNG, JPG, WebP
- Audio exports: MP3, WAV
- Maximum resolution: 4K (3840x2160)
- Clip duration: 5-10 seconds per generation

## Links

- Website: https://apex-studio.ai
- Documentation: https://apex-studio.ai/help
- Pricing: https://apex-studio.ai/#pricing
- Contact: https://apex-studio.ai/contact

## Company

Apex Studio is a video technology company focused on democratizing professional video production through AI. The platform serves marketing teams, content creators, and enterprises worldwide.
